scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development __NODE__=false BABEL_ENV=server webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.development.config.js && NODE_ENV=development __NODE__=true BABEL_ENV=server node src/server
scripts.pro: NODE_ENV=production __NODE__=false webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.production.config.js && NODE_ENV=production __NODE__=true node server
scripts.dev1: NODE_ENV=development __NODE__=false BABEL_ENV=client webpack --config webpack.development.config.js --mode development && NODE_ENV=development __NODE__=true BABEL_ENV=server node src/server
scripts.pro1: NODE_ENV=production __NODE__=false BABEL_ENV=client webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.production.config.js --mode production && NODE_ENV=production __NODE__=true BABEL_ENV=server node server
